biotools.summary: We propose a hybrid FS method, which combines multiple hypothesis testing and affinity propagation (AP)-clustering algorithm along with the Krzanowski & Lai cluster quality index, to select a small yet informative subset of genes.

bioschemas.name: mAPKL
bioschemas.summary: We propose a hybrid FS method, which combines multiple hypothesis testing and affinity propagation (AP)-clustering algorithm along with the Krzanowski & Lai cluster quality index, to select a small yet informative subset of genes.
